title: International tourism spending in Portugal 2012 to 2028
summary: The chart at hand is a line chart where the x axis denotes Year and a y axis denotes Spending in billion euros. In total the number of data points it has is 8.
Overall Spending in billion euros has increased over the Year.
Spending in billion euros is roughly constant from 2012 to 2015, slightly increasing from 2015 to 2017, roughly constant from 2017 to 2018, and finally slightly increasing from 2018 to 2028.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2018 and 2028.
The highest Spending in billion euros, of value 26.4 was reached at Year 2028
Minimum Spending in billion euros about 12.2 was reached at Year 2012
